data.message:
Hi!
I had a local sport page "top sport - ورزش برتر" the page had several admins but one admin posted a troll post ، i don't know who reported This troll post to your company and with out research and advise ، facebook blocked my page !

It's not fair !
My page had a bout 5000 members and how you think to remove or block a page or a profile by only one or two report?

Please answer what should i do ?
Is it posible to repair?

replies.message: Hi there. Sometimes, we place limits on Pages that don't follow the Facebook Pages Terms: http://bit.ly/2uWj5I7. For example, Pages that publish spam may be unpublished. If you believe your Page received limits by mistake, the best way to reach our team is by clicking Appeal below the limit's description at the top of your Page. -Jessica

Thanks،
my english is not professional 
Sometimes i can't get what do you mean
Can you tell me easilly how to recover or recieve my page?
